{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Aruba Networks AP-105.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 300Mbps Wireless Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.arubanetworks.com/products/networking/access-points/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Aruba_Networks_AP-105 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Aruba Networks |model = AP-105 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = January 19, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Aruba_Networks_AP-105 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q9DAP105SDR, Q9DAP105 |icid = 4675A-AP105 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = YOB00C-1.6MM |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7161;AR7161-BC1A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 680 <!-- 680 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4H511638F-LCCC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8021;AR8021-BL1E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = D8:C7:C8 |oui = D8:C7:C8
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = APBoot;1.2.4.4;U-Boot 1.1.4; |stockos = ArubaOS;v6.5.3.3;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console,, RJ45 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/18/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B007T968CY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B008VFTNKE |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SerComm YQK00B-1.0 |rad1modif = Mini PCI (oversized) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9223;AR9223-AC1E; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = SerComm YQK00B-1.0 |rad2modif = Mini PCI (oversized) |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9220;AR9220-AC1A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *OEM: [[SerComm]], Main board: YOB00C-1.6MM, Wireless module: YQK00B-1.0 this appears to be the same wireless module as the [[Aruba Networks AP-104]]
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.arubanetworks.com/pdf/products/DS_AP105.pdf Datasheet] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/aruba/aruba_ap-105 ''Aruba Networks AP-105'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/aruba/aruba_ap-105 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/aruba/ap-105 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
